title: Folk dances
brief_description: An attractively set series of folk-dances, performed by dancers in authentic costumes, dancing to local folk-tunes. The dances include: the Moldavanetz, a Moldavian dance; the Krezhachek, a dance of Belo-Russia; and the Kazaki, a dance of Azerbijzhan. Music only.
